label: uncl4219
comment: Code specifying the priority of a transport service.

values.label: Express
values.comment: Express treatment (if by rail, legal express regime for parcels transport).

values.label: High speed
values.comment: Transport under legal international rail convention (CIM) concluded between rail organizations and based on fast routing and specified timetables.

values.label: Normal speed
values.comment: Transport under legal international rail convention (CIM) concluded between rail organizations.

values.label: Post service
values.comment: Transport under conditions specified by UPU (Universal Postal Union) and Rail organizations (parcels transport only).
